meanings.definition: The act of stripping a currency unit of its status as legal tender.
meanings.sent1: The demonetizations in the country caused confusion among the people.
meanings.sent2: The demonetizations of old coins made them useless for buying goods.
meanings.sent3: The demonetizations of the outdated bills left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The demonetizations of the coins turned them into mere tokens of the past.
meanings.sent5: The sudden demonetizations made everyone realize the importance of currency stability.

meanings.definition: The process of removing the monetary value from something.
meanings.sent1: She studied the demonetizations of precious metals to understand their worth.
meanings.sent2: The demonetizations of the stocks left investors worried about their investments.
meanings.sent3: The demonetizations of the rare stamps made collectors rethink their hobby.
meanings.sent4: The demonetizations of the gems turned them into mere decorations.
meanings.sent5: The gradual demonetizations of the currency led to economic instability.
